game.s_dis: Bubble Bobble: Old and New is a GBA platformer featuring Bub and Bob, 100 levels, classic and updated graphics, single-player and co-op modes, power-ups, and a save system with battery backup.
game.l_dis:
Play Bubble Bobble: Old and New GBA Online – Classic Platformer Adventure

Bubble Bobble: Old and New brings the beloved bubble-blowing dragons, Bub and Bob, to the Game Boy Advance. Players navigate 100 levels, trap enemies in bubbles, and rescue their girlfriends, enjoying both the original arcade experience and a modernized new version with enhanced graphics and sound.

What is Bubble Bobble: Old and New?

Bubble Bobble: Old and New is a platformer featuring both the classic arcade game and a newly updated version. Players control Bub and Bob, blow bubbles to trap enemies, collect power-ups, and unlock bonus lives by gathering letter bubbles to spell "EXTEND." The game supports single-player and cooperative multiplayer modes, with battery backup and two save files for progress tracking.

How to Play Bubble Bobble: Old and New

  • Control Bub & Bob: Navigate each level, jump, and blow bubbles to trap enemies.
  • Pop Bubbles: Defeat enemies by popping the bubbles you trap them in.
  • Collect Power-Ups: Gain new abilities and advantages to progress through levels.
  • Spell "EXTEND": Gather letter bubbles to earn bonus lives.
  • Play Co-op: Team up with a friend for cooperative gameplay to tackle levels together.

Why Play Bubble Bobble: Old and New Online?

Play Bubble Bobble: Old and New unblocked in your browser for free. Enjoy both the nostalgic arcade version and the updated edition with enhanced graphics and sound, featuring classic platforming action on GBA.

Key Features

  • Classic and New Versions: Experience the original arcade game and a newly updated GBA version.
  • 100 Levels: Challenge yourself with a wide variety of stages.
  • Single-Player & Co-op: Play alone or team up with a friend for cooperative fun.
  • Power-Ups & Bonuses: Use special bubbles and collect letter bubbles to gain extra lives.
  • Save System: Battery backup with two save files ensures your progress is never lost.

Help Bub & Bob Rescue Their Girlfriends!

Join Bub and Bob in Bubble Bobble: Old and New for a fun-filled platforming adventure. Trap enemies, collect bonuses, and progress through 100 exciting levels—play unblocked online now!
